reuters.title: NOR-QUEST <NQRLF> MAKES BID FOR NORTHAIR <NRM.TO>
reuters.body: Nor-Quest Resources Inc said it will make a takeover offer to acquire all shares of Northair Mines Ltd on the basis of one Nor-Quest share plus one dlr for two shares of Northair. Nor-Quest said it plans to bring Northair's Willa Mine in the Nelson area of British Columbia into production using Nor-Quest's recently acquired 1200-ton per day mill located in the area. Reuter 
